patthana8.72:1.1_0: Naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana8.72:2.1_0: Naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.72:3.1_0: Naniyatañca naaniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.72:4.1_1: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
